items.title: Le (Past action/completion)
items.comment: Indicates a completed action or a change of state. Example: 我去了中国 (Wǒ qùle Zhōngguó) - 'I went to China.'

items.title: Guò (Past experience)
items.comment: Indicates that something has been experienced before. Example: 我去过中国 (Wǒ qùguò Zhōngguó) - 'I have been to China.'

items.title: Zhèngzài (Ongoing action)
items.comment: Indicates that an action is in progress. Example: 我正在吃饭 (Wǒ zhèngzài chīfàn) - 'I am eating.'
